subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Before there was Gilbert Arenas, the N.B.A. had another great entertainer, Darryl Dawkins. He gave himself the nickname Chocolate Thunder and was fond of naming his dunks.
snippet: Before there was Gilbert Arenas, the N.B.A. had another great entertainer, Darryl Dawkins. He gave himself the nickname Chocolate Thunder and was fond of naming his dunks.
